title: Ep. 06 Dr. Drew Pinsky - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
description:
Before Dr. Drew Pinsky joins Christina P. for a new installment of Where My Mom's At Podcast, Christina reviews some of your emails and voicemails. We got breast feeding hacks, raising kids without a positive parental influence of your own, and some mom fails involving getting locked out without clothes on!

Then we get on the phone with Hope, who is a mother looking for some one-on-one time with Christina. We get into talking about individual identity vs. your new identity as a mother, making friends, and a lot more.

Then, Dr. Drew joins CP and shares his opinion on A LOT of Mom hot topics. How to deal with punishing your kids? Recovering from a traumatic birth? Should you have a second kid? Sleep training? Should you circumcise your kid? Early development issues? Should you be putting pictures of your kids on social media?

We get to all of it in this super helpful and informative episode of WMMA! Don't forget to send your mom fails, mom hacks, or general questions to our email WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com or leave a voicemail at (213) 375-5184.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
